snippet: Gov. Mitch Daniels, a Republican, will get to choose a replacement for Indiana’s ousted top elections official after a State Supreme Court ruling on Thursday.
abstract: Indiana Gov MItch Daniels will choose a replacement for Charlie White, Republican who was removed as the state's top elections official after he was convicted of felony voter fraud and perjury charges.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Mitch Daniels, a Republican, will get to choose a replacement for Indiana’s ousted top elections official after a State Supreme Court ruling on Thursday.

headline.seo: Indiana: Governor Allowed To Pick Secretary of State
headline.main: Indiana: Governor Allowed to Pick Secretary of State
headline.print_headline: Indiana: Governor Allowed To Pick Secretary of State
